summary:
Africa is the second-biggest continent and has the second-most people, after Asia. It's about 30.3 million square kilometers (11.7 million square miles) in size and is home to around 1.4 billion people (as of 2021). That's 20% of the world's land and 6% of its total surface area! Africa has lots of natural resources like gold, diamonds, and oil.

It's surrounded by oceans and seas on most sides and includes many countries, with Algeria as the largest by area and Nigeria as the most populous. Africa is also very diverse, with a rich history and many different cultures.
title: Africa
